an10.32:1.4: Parajiko tassam parisayam nisinno hoti, parajikakatha vippakata hoti, anupasampanno tassam parisayam nisinno hoti, anupasampannakatha vippakata hoti, sikkham paccakkhatako tassam parisayam nisinno hoti, sikkham paccakkhatakakatha vippakata hoti, pandako tassam parisayam nisinno hoti, pandakakatha vippakata hoti, bhikkhunidusako tassam parisayam nisinno hoti, bhikkhunidusakakatha vippakata hoti—
